Premier 35mm Grained White Faux Wood (Swift directblinds)

Our best-selling 35mm Premier Faux Wood range are made from high-quality flame-retardant PVC slats, and this bright, embossed white faux wood easily brightens the room. A perfect addition to rooms that need optimum light and privacy control, our faux wooden blinds are great for kitchens and bathrooms, with easy-care wipe-clean slats and a clean tailored finish, these blinds are a firm favourite with our customers. At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for homes up and down the country. This white faux wood blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Premier 35mm Bright White Faux Wood (Swift directblinds)

Our best-selling 35mm Premier Faux Wood slats are made from high-quality flame-retardant PVC slats, and this bright white faux wood easily brightens the room. A perfect addition to rooms that need optimum light and privacy control, our faux wooden blinds are great for kitchens and bathrooms, with easy-care wipe-clean slats and a clean tailored finish, these blinds are a firm favourite with our customers. Lifetime Smooth Dark Grey (Blinds By Post)

Lifetime Smooth Dark Grey brings an emphatic colour statement in your room, what's not to like about Grey? Our outstanding quality Lifetime Blinds are made to the same high standards as all our other Venetian Blinds - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by our 3 Year Guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fox) and a Pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail. The perfectly natural Faux Wood Collection offers a waterproof and modern venetian blind, child safe and made to measure. Manufactured in the UK.
